item.title: Scratch Shooting Game
item.description: Notice This is not an original game; I just followed instructions on YouTube to create it.!!! YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V_6i1-diUY0 (0:12~1:07) Introduction A simple shooting game. Demo https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/778705218/editor/ Block code
